com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurIRConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurIRConfig

  • public class NurIRConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    NUR module inventory + read configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int irAddr
      Inventory read word address.
      int irBank
      Which bank to read: NurApi.BANK_EPC, NurApi.BANK_TID or NurApi.BANK_USER.
      int irType
      How to do the operation: EPC + data NurApi.IRTYPE_EPCDATA or data only NurApi.IRTYPE_DATAONLY.
      int irWordCount
      Inventory read word count.
      boolean IsRunning
      Whether the inventory + read should start or is currently running

      The constructor.
